body_html:
Maybe this would be a better fit for contrib. The use case for this layer is fairly niche and wouldn't warrant inclusion in core layers.

A bit of feedback:

  • It is preferable not to have API keywords related to implementation details. API keywords should be about domain-specific parameters, i.e. about what users care about.
  • The API proposed is not consistent with that of other pooling layers.

The API proposed is not consistent with that of other pooling layers.
body:
Maybe this would be a better fit for contrib. The use case for this layer is fairly niche and wouldn't warrant inclusion in core layers.

A bit of feedback:

- It is preferable not to have API keywords related to implementation details. API keywords should be about domain-specific parameters, i.e. about what users care about.
- The API proposed is not consistent with that of other pooling layers.
